ygData.msgSnippet: Soulstice, those maximum shot rules are just guidelines, you can break them once or twice, but you can t do it all the time. Since Dcoburn doesn t do that all

Soulstice, those maximum shot rules are just guidelines, you can break them 
once or twice, but you can't do it all the time. Since Dcoburn doesn't do 
that all the time, I don't think it'd be fair for you to ignore it.
